headline: Western Digital (WDC) Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of leading data storage manufacturer Western Digital (NASDAQ: WDC) jumped 9.3% in the afternoon session after analysts grew more optimistic about the company's prospects ahead of its upcoming earnings report, with Bank of America significantly raising its price target on the stock. The firm maintained its "Buy" rating but increased its price target to $257 from $197, a jump of over 30%.
